Lambda functions in Python are like lambda x: x+1.

The following Lambda functions and simple functions are the same:

def add1(x):
    return x+1

add2 = lambda x: x+2

add1(5)     # 6
add2(5)     # also 6

The following part is to test that the code and the line numbers are aligned.
